title: The Week HEALTH - 1 September 2013 (gnv64)

COVER STORY - LANGUAGE AND THE MIND
How does the language you speak shape the way you think? Is the template for language hardwired into your brain? What are the everyday metaphors you use without realising? We answer all these and more
Plus
> Take a quiz to see how good your English is
> Does multilingualism make one smarter?
> A translator and a teacher share their experiences with language
